com.esri.mo2.map.img
Interface Cache

All Superinterfaces:
Searchable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseCache
public interface Cache
extends Searchable

An Image Cache holds (in memory) copies of Image data for a particular ImageServer. Cache data is normally retrieved, stored and organized in Tiles.

See Also:
Tile

Method Summary

          Call this method to cancel all currently operating retrievals.

          call this method to clear the cache.

Methods inherited from interface com.esri.mo2.data.feat.Searchable
search
 

Method Detail

fetch

public void fetch(Envelope extent,
                  Dimension size,
                  SubLayerSnapshot snapshot)
Fetches an image from the remote server. This will start retrieval in a separate thread, and returns straight away before data is retrieved. A DataEvent will be sent to interested Listeners associated with the ImageServer.

Parameters:
extent - the new map extent
size - the new map size
snapshot - a snapshot of the subLayers of the ImageServerLayer
See Also:
MapDataset.fetch(com.esri.mo2.cs.geom.Envelope, double, int, int)

getImageServer

public ImageServer getImageServer()
Returns the associated ImageServer.

cancel

public void cancel()
Call this method to cancel all currently operating retrievals. You might do this, for instance, if you suspect a remote server has gone offline.

clear

public void clear()
call this method to clear the cache.
